body: Live from the #gym! I’m trying to beat my personal record for #deadlifts today. Tune in for some #fitnessmotivation! Any advice before I go for it? #workout #goals

comments.body: You’ve got this! Just make sure to keep your back straight and engage your core during the lift!
@23232 Thanks! Definitely focusing on form—don’t want to mess up my back!
Remember to breathe! It’s easy to forget, but controlled breathing will help you power through that lift.
@34343 Good reminder! I tend to hold my breath when it gets heavy—gonna focus on breathing properly this time.
What weight are you going for? Crush it and don’t rush the lift—control is key!
@45454 I’m going for 300 lbs today! Trying not to rush—slow and steady for sure.
Make sure to do a couple of warm-up sets first! You don’t want to jump straight into heavy lifting without warming up properly.
@56565 Already did some warm-up sets! Thanks for the tip—feeling ready to go for it now.
Good luck! Just picture yourself lifting that weight with ease—it’s all about mindset too!
@67676 Great advice! Going in with a positive mindset. Let’s do this!
